definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, typically derived from the given name Donald, meaning 'world ruler' or 'ruler of the world'. It is used to identify individuals or families bearing this name.
definitions.explanation_cn: 源自英语的姓氏，通常由名字 Donald 演变而来，意为‘世界统治者’。用于指代姓唐纳德森的个人或家族。
definitions.example_en: Professor Donaldson is a leading expert in theoretical physics at Cambridge University.
definitions.example_cn: 唐纳德森教授是剑桥大学理论物理学领域的权威专家。
